resp = client.security.create_cross_cluster_api_key(
    name="my-cross-cluster-api-key",
    access={
        "search": [
            {
                "names": [
                    "logs*"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    metadata={
        "application": "search"
    },
)
print(resp)
